publicationStmt.publisher: Wellcome Library; Bibliotheca Alexandrina; King's College London

msContents.summary: Arabic letter written from Aḥmad (?) to Muḥammad Afandī Ibrāhīm

msItem.title: Letter to Muḥammad Afandī Ibrāhīm
msItem.incipit: fol.1a.1 حضرة أخينا العزٮز محمد افندي ابراهيم بعد السلام عليكم نعرفكم حضر جوابكم وما به علم
msItem.explicit: fol.1a.8 بالبركان عند حضوره يسلمهم له لاحل حضورهم لنا وسلامي الى فى انجاٮكم واخوانكم ودفٮح
msItem.note: A letter consisting of one page to someone known as Muḥammad Afandī Ibrāhīm. It has not been possible to distinguish the full name of the sender.
The date '905' which appears at the bottom of the copy is likely to be a mistakenly rendered '1905'.

seg.note: One letter written on a single sheet.
